product_name: K2 Rival Pro Snow Helmet - Men's
long_description: If you're looking for a lightweight and low-profile helmet, look no further than the K2 Rival Pro snow helmet. It fully integrates with your mobile device for communication and audio. In-mold shell construction yields a lightweight helmet you can wear comfortably all day long. K2 Level 3 Baseline Audio System offers integrated headphones and on-cord mini mic-perfect for connecting to your cell phone or audio player; cord is detachable. 360 K2dialed Fit System delivers a customized fit regardless of head shape with a twist of a dial. 360 K2dialed Fit System features a webbing interface integrated into the helmet's textile liner to evenly distribute pressure. Washable, Full-Wrap Liner cradles the head with a mesh panel that wicks moisture and breathes well to prevent overheating. Passive-Channel Venting directs airflow between the helmet and your head to keep you comfortable and dry. K2 Rival Pro snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
